answers.answer: If the induction is necessary,  you're just taking care of business mama!  If it's unnecessary,  then it's added pressure on you for no real reason...the excitement must be overflowing right now!

I was induced with both pregnancies.  The first one was scary because I had no idea what expect with labor and delivering my baby let alone being induced. I had an epideral so I didn't feel a thing and everything went perfectly. My second one was much less stress because I had already done it and I knew what to expect so I was able to enjoy the experience more.
I have preeclampsia so its has to be done.  Hopefully things go smooth

question: Getting induced Tuesday I am beyond scared OMG
title: december 30 th
